mapper.sql: select pages_id as pagesId, pages_url as pagesUrl, pages_name as pagesName, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, is_valid as isValid, model_name as modelName from authority_pages where 1=1

select.if: and ( pages_url like concat("%",#{search},"%") OR pages_name like concat("%",#{search},"%") OR last_modify_user like concat("%",#{search},"%") )

mapper.select: select DISTINCT model_name as modelName from authority_pages
select pages_id as pagesId, pages_url as pagesUrl, model_name as modelName, pages_name as pagesName from authority_pages
mapper.insert: insert into authority_pages( pages_url, pages_name, last_modify_user, create_time, last_modify_time, is_valid, model_name ) values( #{pagesUrl}, #{pagesName}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{isValid}, #{modelName} )
mapper.update: update authority_pages set pages_url=#{pagesUrl}, pages_name=#{pagesName}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser}, create_time=#{createTime}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime}, is_valid=#{isValid}, model_name = #{modelName} where pages_id=#{pagesId}
